author: Steve McCaskill
title: 5G and coronavirus: scientists say rumours are 'complete and utter rubbish'
description: Anti-5G campaigners make new claims, but government, scientists and industry fight back.
content:
The UK government and mobile industry have reiterated that there is no scientific evidence of a link between 5G networks and the spread of coronavirus.
A baseless conspiracy theory has been spreading on social media with a number of minor celebrities also sh… [+2850 chars]
